detectors.description: TestaToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TestaExchange.sol#415-421) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TestaExchange.sol#225)
